note_text:
PROCEDURE: EBUS-TBNA (endobronchial ultrasound)
Equipment: Olympus BF-UC190F EBUS bronchoscope.
Systematic staging performed with evaluation of N3 then N2 then N1 nodes.
Transbronchial needle aspiration (TBNA) performed using a 22-gauge needle.
Lymph Nodes/Sites Inspected: 4R (lower paratracheal) node; 7 (subcarinal) node; 11L lymph node.
ROSE: Positive for malignancy.
Complete photodocumentation of all accessible stations.
Flumazenil 0.2 mg IV given for reversal.
